name: validator.tool
description: 轻量级的JavaScript表单验证，字符串验证。没有依赖，支持UMD，~3kb。

scripts.build:min: umd Validator src/validator.js | uglifyjs -mc | bannerjs -o > dist/validator.min.js
scripts.build:dist: umd Validator src/validator.js | bannerjs -m | uglifyjs -b beautify=true --comments 'all' > dist/validator.js
scripts.build: npm run build:min && npm run build:dist
